attributes.action: Prioritise the most vulnerable disabled of all ages for the covid vaccine
attributes.additional_details: Those who are disabled have lives worth living and should not be disregarded as less
attributes.background: More than 52% of deaths from covid have been  of those who are disabled.  To make them a priority alongside the second band of those vaccinated. Currently healthy over 65s have priority over those more at risk who have disabilities

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559852
